thread.title: Should you ditch the Santander 123 account when its fee jumps to £60 per year?
thread.title_full: Should you ditch the Santander 123 account when its fee jumps to £60 per year?

author: Nicole Blackmore
title: Should you ditch the Santander 123 account when its fee jumps to £60 per year?
text: Bank accounts Should you ditch the Santander 123 account when its fee jumps to £60 per year? The Spanish bank has angered customers by increasing its current account fees from £24 to £60. We look at which customers should move their money More than three million Santander customers will be charged £60 a year for everyday banking services from January, up from £24 today.
